head.title: April 30-May 6; A Mogul in the Making

hedline.hl1: April 30-May 6; A Mogul in the Making

block.p: After months of publicity leaks, the leadership of the pop powerhouse Arista Records quietly passed to a new generation with Antonio Reid's appointment to lead the 25-year-old record label, which produces performers like Carlos Santana and Whitney Houston.

After months of publicity leaks, the leadership of the pop powerhouse Arista Records quietly passed to a new generation with Antonio Reid's appointment to lead the 25-year-old record label, which produces performers like Carlos Santana and Whitney Houston.
Mr. Reid, 43, a co-founder of LaFace Records and a musician himself, replaces Clive Davis, 67, whose performers had waged an uncommonly public lobbying campaign to support him.
